verses.verse: I said, <S%H559><s%> "Please listen, <S%H8085><s%> you heads <S%H7218><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and rulers <S%H7101><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> Isn't <S%H3045><s%> it for you to know justice? <S%H4941><s%>

You who hate <S%H8130><s%> the good, <S%H2896><s%> and love <S%H157><s%> the evil; <S%H7451><s%> who tear off <S%H1497><s%> their skin, <S%H5785><s%> and their flesh <S%H7607><s%> from off their bones; <S%H6106><s%>

who also eat <S%H398><s%> the flesh <S%H7607><s%> of my people, <S%H5971><s%> and flay <S%H6584><s%> their skin <S%H5785><s%> from off them, <S%H6476><s%> and break their bones, <S%H6106><s%> and chop them in pieces, <S%H6566><s%> as for the pot, <S%H5518><s%> and as flesh <S%H1320><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> the caldron. <S%H7037><s%>

Then they will cry <S%H2199><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> but he will not answer <S%H6030><s%> them. <S%H5641><s%> Yes, he will hide his face <S%H6440><s%> from them at that time, <S%H6256><s%> because they made their deeds <S%H4611><s%> evil. <S%H7489><s%>"

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> concerning the prophets <S%H5030><s%> who lead my people <S%H5971><s%> astray; <S%H8582><s%> for those who feed <S%H5391><s%> their teeth, <S%H8127><s%> they proclaim, <S%H7121><s%> "Peace! <S%H7965><s%>" and whoever doesn't <S%H5414><s%> provide for their mouths, <S%H6310><s%> they prepare <S%H6942><s%> war against him: <S%H4421><s%>

"Therefore night <S%H3915><s%> is over you, <S%H2377><s%> with no vision, and it is dark <S%H2821><s%> to you, <S%H7080><s%> that you may not divine; and the sun <S%H8121><s%> will go down <S%H935><s%> on the prophets, <S%H5030><s%> and the day <S%H3117><s%> will be black over them. <S%H6937><s%>

The seers <S%H2374><s%> shall be disappointed, <S%H954><s%> and the diviners <S%H7080><s%> confounded. <S%H2659><s%> Yes, <S%H5844><s%> they shall all cover their lips; <S%H8222><s%> for there is no answer <S%H4617><s%> from God. <S%H430><s%>"

But as <S%H199><s%> for me, <S%H4390><s%> I am full of power <S%H3581><s%> by the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and of judgment, <S%H4941><s%> and of might, <S%H1369><s%> to declare <S%H5046><s%> to Jacob <S%H3290><s%> his disobedience, <S%H6588><s%> and to Israel <S%H3478><s%> his sin. <S%H2403><s%>

Please listen <S%H8085><s%> to this, <S%H7218><s%> you heads of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and rulers <S%H7101><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> who abhor <S%H8581><s%> justice, <S%H4941><s%> and pervert <S%H6140><s%> all equity. <S%H3477><s%>
They build up <S%H1129><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%> with blood, <S%H1818><s%> and Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> with iniquity. <S%H5766><s%>

Her leaders <S%H7218><s%> judge <S%H8199><s%> for bribes, <S%H7810><s%> and her priests <S%H3548><s%> teach <S%H3384><s%> for a price, <S%H4242><s%> and her prophets <S%H5030><s%> of it tell fortunes <S%H7080><s%> for money: <S%H3701><s%> yet they lean <S%H8172><s%> on Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> "Isn't <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of us? <S%H7451><s%> No disaster will come on us. <S%H935><s%>"

Therefore Zion <S%H6726><s%> for your sake <S%H1558><s%> will be plowed <S%H2790><s%> like a field, <S%H7704><s%> and Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> will become heaps <S%H5856><s%> of rubble, <S%H2022><s%> and the mountain of the temple <S%H1004><s%> like the high places <S%H1116><s%> of a forest. <S%H3293><s%>
